EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting YETI!
We are sorry to hear that you have experienced a thermal retention issue with your Rambler. To better identify any defect in the vacuum insulation we first require a preliminary ice test. This simple test consists of cleaning and drying your Rambler, filling it full of ice (no liquids / only ice), covering it with the accompanied Rambler Lid and allowing it to sit until the ice has completely melted.
Please provide the following information from this test.
• Picture of the Rambler with the YETI embossed logo facing forward.
• Picture of the Rambler full of ice and time of initial start of the test. (ex. 9:00 am)
• Picture of the outside of the Rambler once the ice has melted including the conclusion time which does not have to be exact (ex. 9:00 pm).
Please reply back to this email with these images. Once your warranty request has been reviewed and confirmed a YETI Outfitter will contact you with the next steps.
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters YETI 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com SaveSaveSaveSaveSaveSaveSaveSaveSave
